name: Thieves Guild
description: A secretive organization of criminals; adventurers can seek illicit jobs, fence stolen goods, or become embroiled in underworld politics.
atmosphere: The guild has a dangerous, secretive atmosphere with the scent of illicit activities and the sound of whispered conversations and the constant threat of betrayal. The air carries the weight of criminal enterprise and the essential nature of organized crime, while the atmosphere crackles with the tension of illegal operations and the constant danger of discovery by law enforcement.
